overview: In 19th century London, a sex maniac sneaks into the engagement party of Dr. Henry Jekyll and Miss Fanny Osbourne, turning the event into a nightmarish whirlpool of murder and debauchery

production_companies.name: Multimedia Gesellschaft für Audiovisuelle Information mbH

tagline: Evil runs rampant against the laws of human restraint!
title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Miss Osbourne
